title: Handkerchief, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on  plain weave
inscribed:
"The Dame made a curtsey, the Dog made a bow;
The Dame said, Your servant; th Dog said Bow-wow."
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22.5 x 22.5 cm (8 7/8 x 8 7/8 in.)
description: Text of a nursery rhyme and an illustration on the text in red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cotton
